tool_description: Api for parsing, formatting and validating international phone numbers
name: Phone Validator
title: Phone Validator

api_list.name: Format International
api_list.description: Formats a phone number in the international format by region code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-validator1.p.rapidapi.com/api/ValidatePhone/FormatInternational/15417543010/US"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-validator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-validator1.p.rapidapi.com/api/ValidatePhone/FormatInternational/{phonenumber}/{regioncode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-validator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Supported Regions
api_list.description: Get the list of regions which are managed by the Api

api_list.name: Validate Phone Number
api_list.description: Full validation of a phone number by using only the phone number and region
